name: Solar System Sim (Pellegrino ~thp~ Principe)
description:
Simulation characteristics:

  • added all planets (except Pluto because according to NASA it' considered a dwarf planet like Ceres, Makemake,  Haumea and  Eris).
  • distances between planets are the exact distances appropriately "scaled": the Earth is taken as the reference distance.
  • each planet has the exact amount of rotation and revolution appropriately "scaled": the Earth is taken as the reference.
  • for each planet there is an information panel.
  • each planet has its own "sound".
  • the simulation has music in the background.
  • there are three viewing angles for the camera.
  • the stars in space have a slight twinkle.

Created by Pellegrino ~thp~ Principe
